backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining AC submission storage with Map-based persistence, public functions for submitting/retrieving AC data, and authentication checks requiring non-anonymous principals for admin routes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the Admin Dashboard link was added to the mobile menu in Layout.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing routing, layout with mobile menu, AC submission flow, pricing pages, admin authentication, and styling with warm OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining neutral grayscale palette with custom radius, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the AC Buy application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining routes for home, submit, success, pricing, contact, and admin pages, all wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/ACSubmissionForm: Form component with validation for AC details (brand, model, age, condition) and customer info (name, phone, email), using useACSubmission hook and navigating to success page on submit.
frontend/src/components/ContactInfo.tsx: Card component displaying contact details (phone, email, address, business hours) with icons in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper with sticky header navigation (desktop and mobile menu including Admin Dashboard link), logout button when authenticated, and footer with phone numbers and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/PricingFactorCar: Reusable card component displaying pricing factors with icon (Lucide or image), title, and description with hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useACSubmission.ts: Custom hook managing AC submission state, calling backend actor's submitAirConditioner function, and handling loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality with AuthClient integration, managing identity state and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching submissions data from the backend actor, including getAllSubmissions and getSubmission by ID.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm earth-toned color scheme for light and dark modes, defining CSS variables for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page requiring Internet Identity authentication to view and manage all customer AC purchase submissions in a sortable table.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying company contact information, multiple communication channels, and FAQ section about the AC buying process.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards highlighting service benefits, and how-it-works section for selling used air conditioners.
frontend/src/pages/PricingInfo.tsx: Displays pricing information page explaining factors that affect used AC purchase prices (age, condition, brand, efficiency, demand, original value) with examples and a CTA to submit AC details.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccess.tsx: Success confirmation page shown after AC submission, displaying next steps and providing navigation options to return home or submit another AC.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitAC.tsx: AC submission page containing the form where customers enter details about their used air conditioner, with benefit cards highlighting quick response, no obligation, and secure process.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme with OKLCH color system, container settings, font families, border radius variables, custom shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features, known issues (admin dashboard lacks authentication and navigation link), and architectural notes for a used AC purchase website.
